### About the project: 
This is a project for the STA 426 course offered by UZH Zurich with lecturers Prof. Dr. Mark Robinson and Dr. Hubert Rehrauer. It explores three different data integration methods for multiple single-cell RNAseq datasets and compares the integration results. The dataset used here is an unpublished human scRNA-seq dataset of PBMCs with 6 samples and rougly 45k cells in total.

### About the author: 
Jennifer Probst, MSc student in Computational Biology and Bioinformatics at ETH.
